trans-unit.target: 每当一个武具在你的操控下进战场时，你可以抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·51 | Puresteel Paladin | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Metalcraft — Equipment you control have equip {0} as long as you control three or more artifacts.
trans-unit.target: 金技～只要你操控三个或更多神器，由你操控的武具便具有佩带{0}。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·52 | Return to Dust | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Return to Dust
trans-unit.target: 终归浮尘

trans-unit.resname: CMM·52 | Return to Dust | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Exile target artifact or enchantment. If you cast this spell during your main phase, you may exile up to one other target artifact or enchantment.
trans-unit.target: 放逐目标神器或结界。如果你是在你的行动阶段施放此咒语，则你可以放逐至多另一个目标神器或结界。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·52 | Return to Dust | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Some timelines forever fray, branch, and intermingle. Others end abruptly.
trans-unit.target: 有些时间流会不停歇地摩擦、分支、混杂。其他的则会突然结束。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·53 | Righteous Confluence | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Righteous Confluence
trans-unit.target: 正气交汇

trans-unit.resname: CMM·53 | Righteous Confluence | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Choose three. You may choose the same mode more than once.
trans-unit.target: 选择三项。你可以多次选择同一项。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·53 | Righteous Confluence | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: • Create a 2/2 white Knight creature token with vigilance.
trans-unit.target: •派出一个2/2白色，具警戒异能的骑士衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·53 | Righteous Confluence | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: • Exile target enchantment.
trans-unit.target: •放逐目标结界。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·53 | Righteous Confluence | Card Text: Paragraph 4
trans-unit.source: • You gain 5 life.
trans-unit.target: •你获得5点生命。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·54 | Sephara, Sky's Blade | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sephara, Sky's Blade
trans-unit.target: 驭空刃席斐拉

trans-unit.resname: CMM·54 | Sephara, Sky's Blade | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: You may pay {W} and tap four untapped creatures you control with flying rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
trans-unit.target: 你可以支付{W}并横置四个由你操控、具飞行异能且未横置的生物，而不支付此咒语的法术力费用。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·54 | Sephara, Sky's Blade | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Flying, lifelink
trans-unit.target: 飞行，系命

trans-unit.resname: CMM·54 | Sephara, Sky's Blade | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Other creatures you control with flying have indestructible.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控且具飞行异能的其他生物具有不灭异能。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·55 | Sevinne's Reclamation | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sevinne's Reclamation
trans-unit.target: 瑟纹的复还

trans-unit.resname: CMM·55 | Sevinne's Reclamation | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Return target permanent card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. If this spell was cast from a graveyard, you may copy this spell and may choose a new target for the copy.
trans-unit.target: 将目标法术力值等于或小于3的永久物牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。如果此咒语是从坟墓场施放，则你可以复制此咒语，且可以为该复制品选择新的目标。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·55 | Sevinne's Reclamation | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Flashback {4}{W} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
trans-unit.target: 返照{4}{W}（你可以从你的坟墓场施放此牌，并支付其返照费用，然后将它放逐。）

trans-unit.resname: CMM·56 | Shelter | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Shelter
trans-unit.target: 遮蔽

trans-unit.resname: CMM·56 | Shelter | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 选择一种颜色。目标由你操控的生物获得反该色保护异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·56 | Shelter | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·56 | Shelter | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: From the storm of hellfire, the angel emerged, smiling.
trans-unit.target: 狱火风暴之中浮现出天使身影，面带微笑、毫发无伤。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·57 | Smothering Tithe | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Smothering Tithe
trans-unit.target: 税赋压身

trans-unit.resname: CMM·57 | Smothering Tithe | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Whenever an opponent draws a card, that player may pay {2}. If the player doesn't, you create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
trans-unit.target: 每当任一对手抓一张牌时，该牌手可以支付{2}。若该牌手未如此作，则你派出一个珍宝衍生物。（它是具有「{T}，牺牲此神器：加一点任意颜色的法术力」的神器。）

trans-unit.resname: CMM·57 | Smothering Tithe | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I await your donation."\n—Dasha, Orzhov priest
trans-unit.target: 「我在等你的馈赠。」 ～欧佐夫僧侣达莎

trans-unit.resname: CMM·58 | Spectral Grasp | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Spectral Grasp
trans-unit.target: 魂魅之攫

trans-unit.resname: CMM·58 | Spectral Grasp | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature
trans-unit.target: 结附于生物

trans-unit.resname: CMM·58 | Spectral Grasp | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Enchanted creature can't attack you or planeswalkers you control.
trans-unit.target: 所结附的生物不能攻击你或由你操控的鹏洛客。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·58 | Spectral Grasp | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Enchanted creature can't block creatures you control.
trans-unit.target: 所结附的生物不能阻挡由你操控的生物。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·59 | Steelshaper's Gift | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Steelshaper's Gift
trans-unit.target: 塑铁军之天赋

trans-unit.resname: CMM·59 | Steelshaper's Gift | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Search your library for an Equipment card, reveal that card, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: 从你牌库中搜寻一张武具牌，展示该牌，将它置于你手上，然后洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·59 | Steelshaper's Gift | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Some blades seek their own wielders.
trans-unit.target: 有些刀剑就是会认主人。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·60 | Sublime Exhalation | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sublime Exhalation
trans-unit.target: 升灵吐息

trans-unit.resname: CMM·60 | Sublime Exhalation | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Undaunted (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each opponent.)
trans-unit.target: 不屈（每有一位对手，此咒语便减少{1}来施放。）

trans-unit.resname: CMM·60 | Sublime Exhalation | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Destroy all creatures.
trans-unit.target: 消灭所有生物。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·60 | Sublime Exhalation | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Exhale, and let the winds carry your soul for all eternity.
trans-unit.target: 深呼吸，令清风承灵魂往永生。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·61 | Sunblade Angel | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sunblade Angel
trans-unit.target: 旭刃天使

trans-unit.resname: CMM·61 | Sunblade Angel | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Flying, first strike, vigilance, lifelink
trans-unit.target: 飞行，先攻，警戒，系命

trans-unit.resname: CMM·61 | Sunblade Angel | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: At Feather's command, squadrons of battle angels swarmed out of the *Parhelion II*, unsheathing blades made of molten dawn.
trans-unit.target: 随着飞羽一声令下，战天使大军手中淬有黎明光芒利刃出鞘，纷纷从幻日二号上涌出。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·62 | Sunspear Shikari | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sunspear Shikari
trans-unit.target: 日矛猎户

trans-unit.resname: CMM·62 | Sunspear Shikari | Card Text
trans-unit.source: As long as Sunspear Shikari is equipped, it has first strike and lifelink.
trans-unit.target: 只要日矛猎户佩带武具，它便具有先攻与系命异能。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·62 | Sunspear Shikari | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Raksha's sudden departure split the leonin into two prides. The fight for survival reunited them.
trans-unit.target: 拉夏突然消失，令狮族分裂成两群。御敌求生之战，令他们重归于一体。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·63 | Supply Runners | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Supply Runners
trans-unit.target: 补给奔跃犬

trans-unit.resname: CMM·63 | Supply Runners | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When Supply Runners enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each other creature you control.
trans-unit.target: 当补给奔跃犬进战场时，在每个由你操控的其他生物上各放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·63 | Supply Runners | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Good dogs stay by your side until the end. Great dogs leave to bring back aid.
trans-unit.target: 忠犬会陪你坚持到最后。上犬则会离开去寻回救援。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·64 | Swift Response | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Swift Response
trans-unit.target: 快速反应

trans-unit.resname: CMM·64 | Swift Response | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Destroy target tapped creature.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标已横置的生物。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·64 | Swift Response | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "There's nothing quite as satisfying as delivering a good kick to the face."\n—Adrasteia, Akroan captain
trans-unit.target: 「没有什么事情比往敌人脸上狠狠踹一脚更解气的了。」 ～阿喀洛斯队长阿卓斯蒂娅

trans-unit.resname: CMM·65 | Teshar, Ancestor's Apostle | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Teshar, Ancestor's Apostle
trans-unit.target: 圣祖灵门徒铁夏

trans-unit.resname: CMM·65 | Teshar, Ancestor's Apostle | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: CMM·65 | Teshar, Ancestor's Apostle | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast a historic spell, return target creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放史迹咒语时，将目标法术力值等于或小于3的生物牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。（神器、传奇和传纪是史迹。）

trans-unit.resname: CMM·65 | Teshar, Ancestor's Apostle | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The Ancestor saved us for a purpose."
trans-unit.target: 「圣祖灵救吾人性命必有其用意。」

trans-unit.resname: CMM·66 | Thraben Inspector | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Thraben Inspector
trans-unit.target: 瑟班巡检官

trans-unit.resname: CMM·66 | Thraben Inspector | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When Thraben Inspector enters the battlefield, investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
trans-unit.target: 当瑟班巡检官进战场时，探查。（派出一个线索衍生物。它是具有「{2}，牺牲此神器：抓一张牌」的神器。）

trans-unit.resname: CMM·66 | Thraben Inspector | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "If you've been at this as long as I have, nothing can surprise you. That's the hope, at least."
trans-unit.target: 「如果你也和我一样在这行干了这么多年，那应该没东西能吓到你了。至少这也算是希望吧。」

trans-unit.resname: CMM·67 | Unbounded Potential | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Unbounded Potential
trans-unit.target: 无拘潜能

trans-unit.resname: CMM·67 | Unbounded Potential | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Choose one —
trans-unit.target: 选择一项～

trans-unit.resname: CMM·67 | Unbounded Potential | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: • Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures.
trans-unit.target: •在至多两个目标生物上各放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·67 | Unbounded Potential | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: • Proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)
trans-unit.target: •增殖。（选择任意数量的永久物和／或牌手，然后为其已有之每种指示物各多放置一个同类的指示物。）

trans-unit.resname: CMM·67 | Unbounded Potential | Card Text: Paragraph 4
trans-unit.source: Entwine {3}{W} (Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)
trans-unit.target: 打包{3}{W}（如果你支付打包费用，则两项都选。）

trans-unit.resname: CMM·68 | Wakening Sun's Avatar | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Wakening Sun's Avatar
trans-unit.target: 晓阳化身

trans-unit.resname: CMM·68 | Wakening Sun's Avatar | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When Wakening Sun's Avatar enters the battlefield, if you cast it from your hand, destroy all non-Dinosaur creatures.
trans-unit.target: 当晓阳化身进战场时，若你从你手上施放之，则消灭所有非恐龙生物。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·68 | Wakening Sun's Avatar | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Kinjalli's encompassing rays herald new life in the moment of the sun's dawning."\n—Chitlati, Lightning Rider
trans-unit.target: 「太阳破晓时，津加理光芒笼罩万物，召引新生。」 ～迅雷龙骑奇拉蒂

trans-unit.resname: CMM·69 | Wanderer's Strike | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Wanderer's Strike
trans-unit.target: 飘萍斩

trans-unit.resname: CMM·69 | Wanderer's Strike | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Exile target creature, then proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)
trans-unit.target: 放逐目标生物，然后增殖。（选择任意数量的永久物和／或牌手，然后为其已有之每种指示物各多放置一个同类的指示物。）

trans-unit.resname: CMM·69 | Wanderer's Strike | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Precise, clean cuts. No one saw anything. Again. Tag the report with my code and file it."\n—Lavinia
trans-unit.target: 「切口精准、整齐。没人看清发生了什么。和上次一样。将报告附上我的代码，整理归档。」 ～拉温妮

trans-unit.resname: CMM·70 | Wrath of God | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Wrath of God
trans-unit.target: 神之愤怒

trans-unit.resname: CMM·70 | Wrath of God | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.
trans-unit.target: 消灭所有生物。它们不能重生。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·70 | Wrath of God | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Legend speaks of the lost coastal polis of Olantin, whose inhabitants' hubris enraged the sun god Heliod.
trans-unit.target: 传说中，海滨城邦欧兰廷人才济济但傲气盖天，因此触怒了太阳神赫利欧德，致使此地历史就此亡佚。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·71 | Zetalpa, Primal Dawn | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Zetalpa, Primal Dawn
trans-unit.target: 始辉泽塔帕

trans-unit.resname: CMM·71 | Zetalpa, Primal Dawn | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Flying, double strike, vigilance, trample, indestructible
trans-unit.target: 飞行，连击，警戒，践踏，不灭

trans-unit.resname: CMM·71 | Zetalpa, Primal Dawn | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The sky takes flight and the earth trembles.
trans-unit.target: 天空逃散，大地震颤。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·72 | Aether Gale | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Aether Gale
trans-unit.target: 乙太狂风

trans-unit.resname: CMM·72 | Aether Gale | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Return six target nonland permanents to their owners' hands.
trans-unit.target: 将六个目标非地永久物移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·72 | Aether Gale | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The militia formed up in the central plaza awaiting the onslaught, but the giants never quite made it.
trans-unit.target: 义勇兵已在中心广场严阵以待，准备抵御巨人强大攻势，但敌人却从未出现。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·73 | Aminatou's Augury | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Aminatou's Augury
trans-unit.target: 阿米娜图的卜算

trans-unit.resname: CMM·73 | Aminatou's Augury | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Exile the top eight cards of your library. You may put a land card from among them onto the battlefield. Until end of turn, for each nonland card type, you may cast a spell of that type from among the exiled cards without paying its mana cost.
trans-unit.target: 放逐你牌库顶的八张牌。你可以将其中一张地牌放进战场。直到回合结束，对每种非地之牌张类别而言，你可以从所放逐的牌之中施放一个该类别的咒语，且不需支付其法术力费用。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·74 | Azami, Lady of Scrolls | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Azami, Lady of Scrolls
trans-unit.target: 万卷蓟夫人

trans-unit.resname: CMM·74 | Azami, Lady of Scrolls | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Tap an untapped Wizard you control: Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 横置一个由你操控且未横置的法术师：抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·74 | Azami, Lady of Scrolls | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Choices belong to those with the luxuries of time and distance. We have neither. I recommend we proceed with the plan to destroy all shrines of the kami."\n—Lady Azami, letter to Sensei Hisoka
trans-unit.target: 「选择这东西，是享有充分时间与距离者的特权；可惜这两者吾等均付之匮如。我建议采用的计划，就是消灭所有神明的祭祠。」 ～蓟夫人致密师范

trans-unit.resname: CMM·75 | Body Double | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Body Double
trans-unit.target: 替身妖

trans-unit.resname: CMM·75 | Body Double | Card Text
trans-unit.source: You may have Body Double enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature card in a graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使替身妖当成坟墓场中任一生物牌的复制品来进入战场。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·75 | Body Double | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I am who I pretend to be."
trans-unit.target: 「所化即所成。」

trans-unit.resname: CMM·76 | Braids, Conjurer Adept | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Braids, Conjurer Adept
trans-unit.target: 咒法专家布蕾德

trans-unit.resname: CMM·76 | Braids, Conjurer Adept | Card Text
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player may put an artifact, creature, or land card from their hand onto the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 在每位牌手的维持开始时，该牌手可以将一张神器，生物或地牌从其手上放进战场。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·76 | Braids, Conjurer Adept | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The rifted multiverse became a sea of conflicting realities, each peopled by possible versions of every living being.
trans-unit.target: 受时缝影响的多重宇宙里，现实彼此冲突，挤满了每个生灵各种可能成为的样貌。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·77 | Bribery | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Bribery
trans-unit.target: 贿赂

trans-unit.resname: CMM·77 | Bribery | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Search target opponent's library for a creature card and put that card onto the battlefield under your control. Then that player shuffles.
trans-unit.target: 从目标对手的牌库中搜寻一张生物牌，并将该牌在你的操控下放进战场。然后该牌手洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·77 | Bribery | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "It seems your ticket is in order after all, ma'am."
trans-unit.target: 「女士，您的票看起来都没问题。」

trans-unit.resname: CMM·78 | Brinelin, the Moon Kraken | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Brinelin, the Moon Kraken
trans-unit.target: 明月巨海兽碧鳞

trans-unit.resname: CMM·78 | Brinelin, the Moon Kraken | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When Brinelin, the Moon Kraken enters the battlefield and whenever you cast a spell with mana value 6 or greater, you may return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 当明月巨海兽碧鳞进战场和每当你施放法术力值等于或大于6的咒语时，你可以将目标非地永久物移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·78 | Brinelin, the Moon Kraken | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)
trans-unit.target: 拍档（你可将两个具有拍档异能的生物共同用作指挥官。）

trans-unit.resname: CMM·79 | Capture of Jingzhou | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Capture of Jingzhou
trans-unit.target: 收复荆州

trans-unit.resname: CMM·79 | Capture of Jingzhou | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Take an extra turn after this one.
trans-unit.target: 于本回合后进行额外的一个回合。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·79 | Capture of Jingzhou | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The province of Jingzhou was the fulcrum of the three kingdoms. At separate times it was coveted and controlled by the Wu, the Shu, and the Wei.
trans-unit.target: 荆州在三国时期中是兵家必争之地，屡屡被魏国、蜀国及吴国垂涎。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·80 | Commandeer | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Commandeer
trans-unit.target: 霸占

trans-unit.resname: CMM·80 | Commandeer | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: You may exile two blue cards from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
trans-unit.target: 你可以从你手上放逐两张蓝色牌，而不支付此咒语的法术力费用。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·80 | Commandeer | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Gain control of target noncreature spell. You may choose new targets for it. (If that spell is an artifact, enchantment, or planeswalker, the permanent enters the battlefield under your control.)
trans-unit.target: 获得目标非生物咒语的操控权。你可以为它选择新的目标。（如果该咒语是神器，结界或鹏洛客，则所成之永久物是在你的操控下进战场。）

trans-unit.resname: CMM·81 | Counterspell | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Counterspell
trans-unit.target: 反击咒语

trans-unit.resname: CMM·81 | Counterspell | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Counter target spell.
trans-unit.target: 反击目标咒语。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·81 | Counterspell | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The pyromancer summoned up her mightiest onslaught of fire and rage. Jace feigned interest.
trans-unit.target: 烈焰术士唤出愤怒火焰展开猛攻。杰斯假装很感兴趣。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·82 | Coveted Peacock | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Coveted Peacock
trans-unit.target: 簇捧孔雀

trans-unit.resname: CMM·82 | Coveted Peacock | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: CMM·82 | Coveted Peacock | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever Coveted Peacock attacks, you may goad target creature defending player controls. (Until your next turn, that creature attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able.)
trans-unit.target: 每当簇捧孔雀攻击时，你可以煽惑目标由防御牌手操控的生物。（直到你的下一个回合，该生物每次战斗若能攻击，则必须攻击，且若能攻击除你以外的牌手，则必须如此作。）

trans-unit.resname: CMM·83 | Cryptic Serpent | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Cryptic Serpent
trans-unit.target: 隐密巨蛇

trans-unit.resname: CMM·83 | Cryptic Serpent | Card Text
trans-unit.source: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each instant and sorcery card in your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 你坟墓场中每有一张瞬间与法术牌，此咒语便减少{1}来施放。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·83 | Cryptic Serpent | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: It slithers through the senses, constricting consciousness and poisoning perceptions.
trans-unit.target: 它能绕过感官，束缩感觉并毒害感知。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·84 | Cyclonic Rift | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Cyclonic Rift
trans-unit.target: 龙卷裂空

trans-unit.resname: CMM·84 | Cyclonic Rift | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Return target nonland permanent you don't control to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 将目标不由你操控的非地永久物移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·84 | Cyclonic Rift | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Overload {6}{U} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change "target" in its text to "each.")
trans-unit.target: 超载{6}{U}（你可以支付此咒语的超载费用来施放它。若你如此作，则将其叙述中的「目标」更改为「每个」。）

trans-unit.resname: CMM·84 | Cyclonic Rift | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The Izzet specialize in unnatural disaster.
trans-unit.target: 伊捷以非天然灾害为业。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·85 | Day's Undoing | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Day's Undoing
trans-unit.target: 重启一日

trans-unit.resname: CMM·85 | Day's Undoing | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Each player shuffles their hand and graveyard into their library, then draws seven cards. If it's your turn, end the turn. (Exile all spells and abilities from the stack, including this card. Discard down to your maximum hand size. Damage wears off, and "this turn" and "until end of turn" effects end.)
trans-unit.target: 每位牌手将其手牌与坟墓场洗入其牌库，然后各抓七张牌。如果是在你的回合中，则结束本回合。（放逐堆叠上的所有咒语和异能，包括此牌。你将手牌弃掉，直到满足手牌上限为止。生物上的伤害消失，并且注记着「本回合」与「直到回合结束」的效应均结束。）

trans-unit.resname: CMM·86 | Deep Analysis | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Deep Analysis
trans-unit.target: 深入分析

trans-unit.resname: CMM·86 | Deep Analysis | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target player draws two cards.
trans-unit.target: 目标牌手抓两张牌。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·86 | Deep Analysis | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Flashback—{1}{U}, Pay 3 life. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
trans-unit.target: 返照～{1}{U}，支付3点生命。（你可以从你坟墓场中施放此牌，并支付其返照费用，然后将它放逐。）

trans-unit.resname: CMM·86 | Deep Analysis | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The specimen seems to be broken."
trans-unit.target: 「这样本似乎有点坏。」

trans-unit.resname: CMM·87 | Deranged Assistant | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Deranged Assistant
trans-unit.target: 狂乱助手

trans-unit.resname: CMM·87 | Deranged Assistant | Card Text
trans-unit.source: {T}, Mill a card: Add {C}. (To mill a card, put the top card of your library into your graveyard.)
trans-unit.target: {T}，磨一张牌：加{C}。（磨一张牌的流程是将你牌库顶的牌置入你的坟墓场。）

trans-unit.resname: CMM·87 | Deranged Assistant | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Garl, adjust the slurry dispensers. Garl, fetch more corpses. Garl, quit crying and give me your brain tissue. If he doesn't stop being so rude, I'm quitting."
trans-unit.target: 「嘎耳，把泥浆机调一下。嘎耳，再搬几具尸体来。嘎耳，别哭了，把你的脑组织给我。如果他一直这么粗鲁，我就不干了。」

trans-unit.resname: CMM·88 | Efficient Construction | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Efficient Construction
trans-unit.target: 高效建造

trans-unit.resname: CMM·88 | Efficient Construction | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast an artifact spell, create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying.
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放神器咒语时，派出一个1/1无色，具飞行异能的振翼机衍生神器生物。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·88 | Efficient Construction | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: For some of Ghirapur's aerowrights, building thopters is a byproduct of larger construction efforts.
trans-unit.target: 对吉拉波部分煅空匠而言，振翼机不过是建设大型工程时顺手造出来的东西而已。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·89 | Evacuation | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Evacuation
trans-unit.target: 逃难

trans-unit.resname: CMM·89 | Evacuation | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Return all creatures to their owners' hands.
trans-unit.target: 将所有生物移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·89 | Evacuation | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Once I supply the breeze, you'll see your warriors for the smoke they truly are."\n—Alexi, zephyr mage
trans-unit.target: 「一旦我让风吹起，你会看到手下兵士如烟散去。」 ～西风法师阿蕾克丝

trans-unit.resname: CMM·90 | Exclude | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Exclude
trans-unit.target: 排拒

trans-unit.resname: CMM·90 | Exclude | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Counter target creature spell.
trans-unit.target: 反击目标生物咒语。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·90 | Exclude | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·90 | Exclude | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I don't have time for you right now."\n—Teferi
trans-unit.target: 「现在没空和你闲耗。」 ～泰菲力

trans-unit.resname: CMM·91 | Fact or Fiction | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Fact or Fiction
trans-unit.target: 真伪莫辨

trans-unit.resname: CMM·91 | Fact or Fiction | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Reveal the top five cards of your library. An opponent separates those cards into two piles. Put one pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 展示你牌库顶的五张牌。由任一对手将它们分成两堆。将其中一堆置于你手上，另一堆则置入你的坟墓场。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·91 | Fact or Fiction | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Slimefoot, I know I said I wanted to grow our repository of knowledge, but this isn't what I had in mind."
trans-unit.target: 「黏足，我是说过要丰富我们的知识储备，但我想的不是这种方式。」

trans-unit.resname: CMM·92 | Faerie Artisans | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Faerie Artisans
trans-unit.target: 仙灵工匠

trans-unit.resname: CMM·92 | Faerie Artisans | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: CMM·92 | Faerie Artisans | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever a nontoken creature enters the battlefield under an opponent's control, create a token that's a copy of that creature except it's an artifact in addition to its other types. Then exile all other tokens created with Faerie Artisans.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个非衍生物的生物在对手操控下进战场时，派出一个衍生物，此衍生物为该生物的复制品，但额外具有神器此类别。然后放逐所有以仙灵工匠派出的其他衍生物。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·93 | Fall from Favor | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Fall from Favor
trans-unit.target: 失宠

trans-unit.resname: CMM·93 | Fall from Favor | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature
trans-unit.target: 结附于生物

trans-unit.resname: CMM·93 | Fall from Favor | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When Fall from Favor enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature and you become the monarch.
trans-unit.target: 当失宠进战场时，横置所结附的生物，且你成为君主。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·93 | Fall from Favor | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step unless that player is the monarch.
trans-unit.target: 除非所结附之生物的操控者是君主，否则它于该牌手的重置步骤中不能重置。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·94 | Fierce Guardianship | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Fierce Guardianship
trans-unit.target: 厉行守护

trans-unit.resname: CMM·94 | Fierce Guardianship | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: If you control a commander, you may cast this spell without paying its mana cost.
trans-unit.target: 如果你操控指挥官，则你可以施放此咒语，且不需支付其法术力费用。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·94 | Fierce Guardianship | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Counter target noncreature spell.
trans-unit.target: 反击目标非生物咒语。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·94 | Fierce Guardianship | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Hunt somewhere else. This is your only warning."\n—Gavi, nest warden
trans-unit.target: 「去别处打猎。我只警告这一次。」 ～巢穴护卫盖薇

trans-unit.resname: CMM·95 | Filigree Attendant | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Filigree Attendant
trans-unit.target: 丝金随员

trans-unit.resname: CMM·95 | Filigree Attendant | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: CMM·95 | Filigree Attendant | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Filigree Attendant's power is equal to the number of artifacts you control.
trans-unit.target: 丝金随员的力量等同于由你操控之神器数量。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·95 | Filigree Attendant | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The perfect assistant is one that's responsive, dextrous, and capable of reaching all the high shelves."\n—Coruk, Esper artificer
trans-unit.target: 「最完美的助理要反应快，手工巧，还能摸到架子最高处。」 ～艾斯波神器师寇路

trans-unit.resname: CMM·96 | Frantic Search | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Frantic Search
trans-unit.target: 狂搜乱寻

trans-unit.resname: CMM·96 | Frantic Search | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Draw two cards, then discard two cards. Untap up to three lands.
trans-unit.target: 抓两张牌，然后弃两张牌。重置至多三个地。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·96 | Frantic Search | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: It took the banning of temporal manipulation at Tolaria West to teach its students the value of time.
trans-unit.target: 待陶拉里亚西境学院禁止时间操纵课程之后，学生才真正晓得时间的价值。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·97 | Ghost of Ramirez DePietro | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ghost of Ramirez DePietro
trans-unit.target: 拉米雷迪皮托的鬼魂

trans-unit.resname: CMM·97 | Ghost of Ramirez DePietro | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Ghost of Ramirez DePietro can't be blocked by creatures with toughness 3 or greater.
trans-unit.target: 拉米雷迪皮托的鬼魂不能被防御力等于或大于3的生物阻挡。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·97 | Ghost of Ramirez DePietro | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever Ghost of Ramirez DePietro deals combat damage to a player, choose up to one target card in a graveyard that was discarded or put there from a library this turn. Put that card into its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 每当拉米雷迪皮托的鬼魂对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，选择至多一张目标在坟墓场中的牌，且须为本回合中弃掉或从牌库进入该处者。将该牌置于其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·97 | Ghost of Ramirez DePietro | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)
trans-unit.target: 拍档（你可将两个具有拍档异能的生物共同用作指挥官。）

trans-unit.resname: CMM·98 | Ghostly Flicker | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ghostly Flicker
trans-unit.target: 鬼影闪烁

trans-unit.resname: CMM·98 | Ghostly Flicker | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Exile two target artifacts, creatures, and/or lands you control, then return those cards to the battlefield under your control.
trans-unit.target: 放逐两个目标由你操控的神器，生物和／或地，然后将这些牌在你的操控下移回战场。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·98 | Ghostly Flicker | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Sometimes it's useful to take a break from existence.
trans-unit.target: 有时暂且消失也不错。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·99 | Goliath Sphinx | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Goliath Sphinx
trans-unit.target: 巨硕史芬斯

trans-unit.resname: CMM·99 | Goliath Sphinx | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: CMM·99 | Goliath Sphinx | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: He makes his home on the tallest mountain in Sejiri, where the vista is as endless as his patience.
trans-unit.target: 他在塞基黎最高的山上歇息翅翼；此处的远景无限宽广，一如其耐心。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·100 | Inga Rune-Eyes | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Inga Rune-Eyes
trans-unit.target: 符眼茵嘉

trans-unit.resname: CMM·100 | Inga Rune-Eyes | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When Inga Rune-Eyes enters the battlefield, scry 3.
trans-unit.target: 当符眼茵嘉进战场时，占卜3。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·100 | Inga Rune-Eyes | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When Inga Rune-Eyes dies, draw three cards if three or more creatures died this turn.
trans-unit.target: 当符眼茵嘉死去时，如果本回合中有三个或更多生物死去，则抓三张牌。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·100 | Inga Rune-Eyes | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Each path ever charted by an Omenseeker is etched into her eyes.
trans-unit.target: 预兆觅径人编绘的每条径路，都深深蚀刻在她眼中。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·101 | Kaho, Minamo Historian | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Kaho, Minamo Historian
trans-unit.target: 水面院史家歌穗

trans-unit.resname: CMM·101 | Kaho, Minamo Historian | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When Kaho, Minamo Historian enters the battlefield, search your library for up to three instant cards, exile them, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: 当水面院史家歌穗进战场时，从你牌库中搜寻至多三张瞬间牌，将它们放逐，然后洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·101 | Kaho, Minamo Historian | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {X}, {T}: You may cast a spell with mana value X from among cards exiled with Kaho without paying its mana cost.
trans-unit.target: {X}，{T}：你可以从以歌穗放逐的牌之中施放一个法术力值为X的咒语，且不需支付其法术力费用。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·102 | Looter il-Kor | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Looter il-Kor
trans-unit.target: 寇族黜人掠夺者

trans-unit.resname: CMM·102 | Looter il-Kor | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
trans-unit.target: 次元幽影（此生物只能阻挡具次元幽影异能的生物，亦只能被具此异能的生物阻挡。）

trans-unit.resname: CMM·102 | Looter il-Kor | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever Looter il-Kor deals damage to an opponent, draw a card, then discard a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当寇族黜人掠夺者向任一对手造成伤害时，抓一张牌，然后弃一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·102 | Looter il-Kor | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Unable to touch items of value, he goes forth to steal secrets instead.
trans-unit.target: 既然贵重品无从得手，他转而窃取秘密。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·103 | Lorthos, the Tidemaker | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Lorthos, the Tidemaker
trans-unit.target: 兴潮罗佐司

trans-unit.resname: CMM·103 | Lorthos, the Tidemaker | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Whenever Lorthos, the Tidemaker attacks, you may pay {8}. If you do, tap up to eight target permanents. Those permanents don't untap during their controllers' next untap steps.
trans-unit.target: 每当兴潮罗佐司攻击时，你可以支付{8}。若你如此作，则横置至多八个目标永久物。这些永久物于其操控者的下一个重置步骤中不能重置。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·103 | Lorthos, the Tidemaker | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: When Lorthos emerges from his deepwater realm, the tides bow to his will and the coastline cowers in his presence.
trans-unit.target: 罗佐司从其深海国度现身，潮浪为其意志而躬身行礼，海岸见其身形即畏缩奔逃。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·104 | Loyal Drake | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Loyal Drake
trans-unit.target: 忠诚龙兽

trans-unit.resname: CMM·104 | Loyal Drake | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: CMM·104 | Loyal Drake | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Lieutenant — At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control your commander, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 副官～在你回合的战斗开始时，若你操控你的指挥官，则抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·104 | Loyal Drake | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Doves and pigeons are too subtle. When I send a message, I want it to have some teeth."\n—Aeschel, royal diplomat
trans-unit.target: 「鸿雁飞鸽什么的都太不显眼了。传书的时候，我还是喜欢派有牙齿的去。」 ～皇家外交官伊舍尔

trans-unit.resname: CMM·105 | Minds Aglow | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Minds Aglow
trans-unit.target: 心神光辉

trans-unit.resname: CMM·105 | Minds Aglow | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Join forces — Starting with you, each player may pay any amount of mana. Each player draws X cards, where X is the total amount of mana paid this way.
trans-unit.target: 携手～由你开始，每位牌手各可以支付任意数量的法术力。每位牌手各抓X张牌，X为以此法支付的法术力总数量。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·106 | Murder of Crows | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Murder of Crows
trans-unit.target: 乌鸦群

trans-unit.resname: CMM·106 | Murder of Crows | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: CMM·106 | Murder of Crows | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever another creature dies, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当另一个生物死去时，你可以抓一张牌。若你如此作，则弃一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·106 | Murder of Crows | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Even more than carrion, they crave the last words of the dying.
trans-unit.target: 比起腐肉，它们更渴求死者的临终话语。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·107 | Murmuring Mystic | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Murmuring Mystic
trans-unit.target: 细语秘教徒

trans-unit.resname: CMM·107 | Murmuring Mystic | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, create a 1/1 blue Bird Illusion creature token with flying.
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放瞬间或法术咒语时，派出一个1/1蓝色，具飞行异能的鸟／虚影衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·107 | Murmuring Mystic | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Rumors float through the city like crows, alighting on citizens seemingly at random.
trans-unit.target: 谣言如鸦群飞舞城中，看似不经意间就停在市民肩头。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·108 | Mystic Confluence | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Mystic Confluence
trans-unit.target: 秘法交汇

trans-unit.resname: CMM·108 | Mystic Confluence | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Choose three. You may choose the same mode more than once.
trans-unit.target: 选择三项。你可以多次选择同一项。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·108 | Mystic Confluence | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: • Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}.
trans-unit.target: •除非目标咒语的操控者支付{3}，否则反击之。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·108 | Mystic Confluence | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: • Return target creature to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: •将目标生物移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·108 | Mystic Confluence | Card Text: Paragraph 4
trans-unit.source: • Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: •抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·109 | Padeem, Consul of Innovation | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Padeem, Consul of Innovation
trans-unit.target: 求新执政珀蒂

trans-unit.resname: CMM·109 | Padeem, Consul of Innovation | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Artifacts you control have hexproof.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的神器具有辟邪异能。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·109 | Padeem, Consul of Innovation | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control the artifact with the highest mana value or tied for the highest mana value, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，若你操控法术力值最大或与他者同为最大的神器，则抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·109 | Padeem, Consul of Innovation | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Impress me."
trans-unit.target: 「让我大开眼界吧。」

trans-unit.resname: CMM·110 | Personal Tutor | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Personal Tutor
trans-unit.target: 个人导师

trans-unit.resname: CMM·110 | Personal Tutor | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Search your library for a sorcery card, reveal it, then shuffle and put that card on top.
trans-unit.target: 从你牌库中搜寻一张法术牌，展示该牌，然后洗牌，并将该牌置于牌库顶。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·110 | Personal Tutor | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Lomelda had spent four semesters on the waitlist for Kasmina's Advanced Polymorphological Theory seminar. She was determined not to miss a word.
trans-unit.target: 洛梅达在等候名单上足足排了四个学期，才如愿修读克蜜娜的高阶变型原理课程。她决心绝不听漏一字。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·111 | Phyrexian Ingester | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Phyrexian Ingester
trans-unit.target: 非瑞克西亚摄食兽

trans-unit.resname: CMM·111 | Phyrexian Ingester | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Imprint — When Phyrexian Ingester enters the battlefield, you may exile target nontoken creature.
trans-unit.target: 压印～当非瑞克西亚摄食兽进战场时，你可以放逐目标非衍生物的生物。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·111 | Phyrexian Ingester | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Phyrexian Ingester gets +X/+Y, where X is the exiled creature card's power and Y is its toughness.
trans-unit.target: 非瑞克西亚摄食兽得+X/+Y，X为所放逐之生物牌的力量，Y为该牌的防御力。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·112 | Portal Mage | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Portal Mage
trans-unit.target: 境道法师

trans-unit.resname: CMM·112 | Portal Mage | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flash
trans-unit.target: 闪现

trans-unit.resname: CMM·112 | Portal Mage | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When Portal Mage enters the battlefield during the declare attackers step, you may reselect which player or permanent target attacking creature is attacking. (It can't attack its controller or their permanents.)
trans-unit.target: 当境道法师于宣告攻击者步骤中进战场时，你可以为目标进行攻击的生物重新选择其攻击的牌手或永久物。（它不能攻击其操控者或其操控者的永久物。）

trans-unit.resname: CMM·113 | Reality Shift | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Reality Shift
trans-unit.target: 实界变化

trans-unit.resname: CMM·113 | Reality Shift | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Exile target creature. Its controller manifests the top card of their library. (That player puts the top card of their library onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. If it's a creature card, it can be turned face up any time for its mana cost.)
trans-unit.target: 放逐目标生物。其操控者显化其牌库顶牌。（该牌手将其牌库顶牌面朝下地放进战场，当成2/2生物。若该牌是生物牌，则可随时支付其法术力费用来翻回正面。）

trans-unit.resname: CMM·114 | Renowned Weaponsmith | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Renowned Weaponsmith
trans-unit.target: 享誉兵匠

trans-unit.resname: CMM·114 | Renowned Weaponsmith | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {C}{C}. Spend this mana only to cast artifact spells or activate abilities of artifacts.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{C}{C}。此法术力只能用来施放神器咒语，或是起动神器的异能。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·114 | Renowned Weaponsmith | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {U}, {T}: Search your library for a card named Heart-Piercer Bow or Vial of Dragonfire, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: {U}，{T}：从你牌库中搜寻一张名称为穿心弓或龙炎瓶的牌，展示该牌，将它置于你手上，然后洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·115 | Resculpt | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Resculpt
trans-unit.target: 重新雕塑

trans-unit.resname: CMM·115 | Resculpt | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Exile target artifact or creature. Its controller creates a 4/4 blue and red Elemental creature token.
trans-unit.target: 放逐目标神器或生物。其操控者派出一个4/4，蓝红双色的元素衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·115 | Resculpt | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Critics were struck first by the elemental's surprising grace, and then by its fists.
trans-unit.target: 评委先是为这元素的绝伦优雅倾倒，而后被它的数记重拳击倒。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·116 | Reverse Engineer | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Reverse Engineer
trans-unit.target: 究研原理

trans-unit.resname: CMM·116 | Reverse Engineer | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Improvise (Your artifacts can help cast this spell. Each artifact you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1}.)
trans-unit.target: 拼造（此咒语能用你的神器来协助施放。你起动完法术力异能之后每横置一个神器，就能为此咒语支付{1}。）

trans-unit.resname: CMM·116 | Reverse Engineer | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Draw three cards.
trans-unit.target: 抓三张牌。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·116 | Reverse Engineer | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The Hold, an illegal research facility in a derelict merchant ship, became a wellspring of renegade intelligence.
trans-unit.target: 「要塞」这处设在废弃商船上的非法研究设施，现已成为乱匠的情报泉源。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·117 | Rise from the Tides | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Rise from the Tides
trans-unit.target: 浪潮复生

trans-unit.resname: CMM·117 | Rise from the Tides | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Create a tapped 2/2 black Zombie creature token for each instant and sorcery card in your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 你坟墓场中每有一张瞬间与法术牌，便派出一个已横置的2/2黑色灵俑衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·117 | Rise from the Tides | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Dear brother, it's sweet that you have chosen to share your toys with Ludevic, but I too have found some new playmates."\n—Ghoulcaller Gisa
trans-unit.target: 「亲爱的弟弟，你把自己的玩具和卢德维一起分享真是好心，不过我也找到了一些新玩伴。」 ～尸鬼牧者基沙

trans-unit.resname: CMM·118 | Sai, Master Thopterist | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sai, Master Thopterist
trans-unit.target: 扑翼大师塞埃

trans-unit.resname: CMM·118 | Sai, Master Thopterist | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast an artifact spell, create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying.
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放神器咒语时，派出一个1/1无色，具飞行异能的振翼机衍生神器生物。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·118 | Sai, Master Thopterist | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {1}{U}, Sacrifice two artifacts: Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: {1}{U}，牺牲两个神器：抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·118 | Sai, Master Thopterist | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Industry without artistry is just a fancy way to fill the junkyard."
trans-unit.target: 「量产品若不加修饰，产出物与垃圾无异。」

trans-unit.resname: CMM·119 | Shipwreck Dowser | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Shipwreck Dowser
trans-unit.target: 船难探寻客

trans-unit.resname: CMM·119 | Shipwreck Dowser | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
trans-unit.target: 灵技（每当你施放非生物咒语时，此生物得+1/+1直到回合结束。）

trans-unit.resname: CMM·119 | Shipwreck Dowser | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When Shipwreck Dowser enters the battlefield, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
trans-unit.target: 当船难探寻客进战场时，将目标瞬间或法术牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·119 | Shipwreck Dowser | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Lost at sea doesn't have to mean lost forever.
trans-unit.target: 失落于海中不一定意味着无法再度寻得。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·120 | Spellseeker | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Spellseeker
trans-unit.target: 觅咒师

trans-unit.resname: CMM·120 | Spellseeker | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When Spellseeker enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an instant or sorcery card with mana value 2 or less, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: 当觅咒师进战场时，你可以从你牌库中搜寻一张法术力值等于或小于2的瞬间或法术牌，展示该牌，将它置于你手上，然后洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·120 | Spellseeker | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Mages and warriors recruited from across Kylem display their skills at Valor's Reach.
trans-unit.target: 来自全凯勒姆的法师与战士在英勇巅各展身手。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·121 | Stitcher Geralf | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Stitcher Geralf
trans-unit.target: 拼接师基拉夫

trans-unit.resname: CMM·121 | Stitcher Geralf | Card Text
trans-unit.source: {2}{U}, {T}: Each player mills three cards. Exile up to two creature cards put into graveyards this way. Create an X/X blue Zombie creature token, where X is the total power of the cards exiled this way.
trans-unit.target: {2}{U}，{T}：每位牌手各磨三张牌。放逐至多两张以此法进入坟墓场的生物牌。派出一个X/X蓝色灵俑衍生生物，X为以此法放逐各牌的力量总和。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·122 | Stormsurge Kraken | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Stormsurge Kraken
trans-unit.target: 岚涛巨海兽

trans-unit.resname: CMM·122 | Stormsurge Kraken | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Hexproof
trans-unit.target: 辟邪

trans-unit.resname: CMM·122 | Stormsurge Kraken | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Lieutenant — As long as you control your commander, Stormsurge Kraken gets +2/+2 and has "Whenever Stormsurge Kraken becomes blocked, you may draw two cards."
trans-unit.target: 副官～只要你操控你的指挥官，岚涛巨海兽便得+2/+2且具有「每当岚涛巨海兽被阻挡时，你可以抓两张牌。」

trans-unit.resname: CMM·122 | Stormsurge Kraken | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Most see krakens as wantonly violent, failing to notice their meticulous attention to detail when dismantling a vessel.
trans-unit.target: 许多人都认为巨海怪只会恣意施暴，却从未注意到它们破坏船舶时的细腻讲究。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·123 | Sun Quan, Lord of Wu | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sun Quan, Lord of Wu
trans-unit.target: 吴国君主孙权

trans-unit.resname: CMM·123 | Sun Quan, Lord of Wu | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Creatures you control have horsemanship. (They can't be blocked except by creatures with horsemanship.)
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的生物具有马术异能。（它们只能被具马术异能的生物阻挡。）

trans-unit.resname: CMM·123 | Sun Quan, Lord of Wu | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "One score and four he reigned, the Southland king: / A dragon coiled, a tiger poised below the mighty Yangtze."
trans-unit.target: 「二十四年兴大业，龙蟠虎踞在江东。」 （第一零八回 丁奉雪中奋短兵）

trans-unit.resname: CMM·124 | Talrand, Sky Summoner | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Talrand, Sky Summoner
trans-unit.target: 空召师陶岚

trans-unit.resname: CMM·124 | Talrand, Sky Summoner | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, create a 2/2 blue Drake creature token with flying.
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放瞬间或法术咒语时，派出一个2/2蓝色，具飞行异能的龙兽衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·124 | Talrand, Sky Summoner | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The seas are vast, but the skies are even more so. Why be content with one kingdom when I can rule them both?"
trans-unit.target: 「大海浩瀚，但天空更加无际。如果我能同时统治两者，又何必只安于其一？」

trans-unit.resname: CMM·125 | Teferi, Temporal Archmage | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Teferi, Temporal Archmage
trans-unit.target: 时间大法师泰菲力

trans-unit.resname: CMM·125 | Teferi, Temporal Archmage | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: +1: Look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other on the bottom of your library.
trans-unit.target: +1：检视你牌库顶的两张牌。将其中一张置于你手上，另一张则置于你的牌库底。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·125 | Teferi, Temporal Archmage | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: −1: Untap up to four target permanents.
trans-unit.target: −1：重置至多四个目标永久物。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·125 | Teferi, Temporal Archmage | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: −10: You get an emblem with "You may activate loyalty abilities of planeswalkers you control on any player's turn any time you could cast an instant."
trans-unit.target: −10：你获得具有以下异能的徽记～「你可以在任意牌手的回合中，于你能够施放瞬间的时机下，起动由你操控之鹏洛客的忠诚异能。」

trans-unit.resname: CMM·125 | Teferi, Temporal Archmage | Card Text: Paragraph 4
trans-unit.source: Teferi, Temporal Archmage can be your commander.
trans-unit.target: 时间大法师泰菲力可用作指挥官。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·126 | Tetsuko Umezawa, Fugitive | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Tetsuko Umezawa, Fugitive

trans-unit.resname: CMM·126 | Tetsuko Umezawa, Fugitive | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Creatures you control with power or toughness 1 or less can't be blocked.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控且力量或防御力等于或小于1的生物不能被阻挡。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·126 | Tetsuko Umezawa, Fugitive | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "My ancestor Toshiro used to say, 'Life is a series of choices between bad and worse.' I'm a master of making great bad choices."
trans-unit.target: 「俊郎先祖曾说，『生命是一连串的选择，每次都只有糟与更糟可选。』我最擅长选『糟』。」

trans-unit.resname: CMM·127 | Thryx, the Sudden Storm | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Thryx, the Sudden Storm
trans-unit.target: 疾风暴特律克斯

trans-unit.target: 你施放之法术力值等于或大于5的咒语减少{1}来施放，且不能被反击。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·127 | Thryx, the Sudden Storm | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Even in their mountain fortresses, the Akroans have learned not to anger Thassa.
trans-unit.target: 即便躲在山脉要塞当中，阿喀洛斯人也学会了不要激怒塔萨。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·128 | Torrential Gearhulk | Card Name

trans-unit.resname: CMM·128 | Torrential Gearhulk | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flash
trans-unit.target: 闪现

trans-unit.resname: CMM·128 | Torrential Gearhulk | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When Torrential Gearhulk enters the battlefield, you may cast target instant card from your graveyard without paying its mana cost. If that spell would be put into your graveyard, exile it instead.
trans-unit.target: 当汹涌巨械进战场时，你可以从你坟墓场中施放目标瞬间牌，且不需支付其法术力费用。如果该咒语将进入你的坟墓场，则改为将它放逐。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·129 | Tromokratis | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 除非卓莫克雷提正进行攻击或阻挡，否则它便具有辟邪异能。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·129 | Tromokratis | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Tromokratis can't be blocked unless all creatures defending player controls block it. (If any creature that player controls doesn't block this creature, it can't be blocked.)
trans-unit.target: 除非由防御牌手操控的所有生物均阻挡之，否则卓莫克雷提便不能被阻挡。（如果任一由该牌手操控的生物未阻挡此生物，则它便不能被阻挡。）

trans-unit.target: {5}：将你的牌库洗牌，然后放逐顶牌。直到回合结束，你可以使用该牌且不需支付其法术力费用。

trans-unit.target: 循环{1}{U}（{1}{U}，弃掉此牌：抓一张牌。）

If the card's mana value is 4 or greater, repeat this process. Demonlord Belzenlok deals 1 damage to you for each card put into your hand this way.

trans-unit.resname: CMM·160 | Final Parting | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Search your library for two cards. Put one into your hand and the other into your graveyard. Then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: 从你牌库中搜寻两张牌。将其中一张置于你手上，另一张则置入你的坟墓场。然后洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·160 | Final Parting | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Sleep now, brother. That is the one gift I can give you."\n—Liliana Vess
trans-unit.target: 「安息吧，哥哥。这便是我能送你的礼物。」 ～莉莲娜维斯

trans-unit.resname: CMM·161 | Ghoulcaller Gisa | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ghoulcaller Gisa
trans-unit.target: 尸鬼牧者基沙

trans-unit.resname: CMM·161 | Ghoulcaller Gisa | Card Text
trans-unit.source: {B}, {T}, Sacrifice another creature: Create X 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens, where X is the sacrificed creature's power.
trans-unit.target: {B}，{T}，牺牲另一个生物：派出X个2/2黑色灵俑衍生生物，X为所牺牲生物的力量。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·161 | Ghoulcaller Gisa | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Geralf, must you always whine? I agreed to nothing. I'll raise ghouls anytime I wish."
trans-unit.target: 「基拉夫，你非得喋喋不休吗？我什么都不同意。我要什么时候召唤食尸鬼，就什么时候召唤。」

trans-unit.resname: CMM·162 | Gonti, Lord of Luxury | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Gonti, Lord of Luxury
trans-unit.target: 奢华领主贡提

trans-unit.resname: CMM·162 | Gonti, Lord of Luxury | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Deathtouch
trans-unit.target: 死触

trans-unit.resname: CMM·162 | Gonti, Lord of Luxury | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When Gonti, Lord of Luxury enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of target opponent's library, exile one of them face down, then put the rest on the bottom of that library in a random order. You may cast that card for as long as it remains exiled, and mana of any type can be spent to cast it.
trans-unit.target: 当奢华领主贡提进战场时，检视目标对手牌库顶的四张牌，将其中一张牌面朝下地放逐，然后将其余的牌以随机顺序置于该牌库底。于该牌持续放逐的时段内，你可以施放该牌，且能用任意种类的法术力来施放。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·163 | Goremand | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Goremand
trans-unit.target: 嗜血餮魔

trans-unit.resname: CMM·163 | Goremand | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲一个生物，以作为施放此咒语的额外费用。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·163 | Goremand | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Flying, trample
trans-unit.target: 飞行，践踏

trans-unit.resname: CMM·163 | Goremand | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: When Goremand enters the battlefield, each opponent sacrifices a creature.
trans-unit.target: 当嗜血餮魔进战场时，每位对手各牺牲一个生物。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·164 | Gorex, the Tombshell | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Gorex, the Tombshell
trans-unit.target: 驮墓龟高雷兹

trans-unit.resname: CMM·164 | Gorex, the Tombshell | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may exile any number of creature cards from your graveyard. This spell costs {2} less to cast for each card exiled this way.
trans-unit.target: 你可以从你坟墓场放逐任意数量的生物牌，以作为施放此咒语的额外费用。每以此法放逐一张牌，此咒语便减少{2}来施放。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·164 | Gorex, the Tombshell | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Deathtouch
trans-unit.target: 死触

trans-unit.resname: CMM·164 | Gorex, the Tombshell | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever Gorex, the Tombshell attacks or dies, choose a card at random exiled with Gorex and put that card into its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 每当驮墓龟高雷兹攻击或死去时，随机选择一张以高雷兹放逐的牌，并将该牌置于其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·165 | Grave Pact | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Grave Pact
trans-unit.target: 墓约

trans-unit.resname: CMM·165 | Grave Pact | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature you control dies, each other player sacrifices a creature.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个由你操控的生物死去时，每位其他牌手各牺牲一个生物。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·165 | Grave Pact | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Denied the peace of the Blessed Sleep, geists lash out at the living, and the cycle of anger and unrest continues unbroken.
trans-unit.target: 未得受福安眠的不息游魂会向生者发难，这一愤怒无歇的循环正因此永续不断。

trans-unit.target: 无情手段

trans-unit.resname: CMM·166 | Heartless Act | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Choose one —
trans-unit.target: 选择一项～

trans-unit.resname: CMM·166 | Heartless Act | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: • Destroy target creature with no counters on it.
trans-unit.target: •消灭目标其上没有指示物的生物。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·166 | Heartless Act | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: • Remove up to three counters from target creature.
trans-unit.target: •从目标生物上移去至多三个指示物。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·166 | Heartless Act | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "It's them or us."\n—General Kudro
trans-unit.target: 「不是它们死，就是我们亡。」 ～寇卓将军

trans-unit.resname: CMM·167 | Imp's Mischief | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Imp's Mischief
trans-unit.target: 小恶魔的作弄

trans-unit.resname: CMM·167 | Imp's Mischief | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Change the target of target spell with a single target. You lose life equal to that spell's mana value.
trans-unit.target: 为仅指定单一目标的目标咒语更改目标。你失去等同于该咒语法术力值的生命。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·167 | Imp's Mischief | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Do the innocent pay for the crimes of the guilty? Of course they do. That's the fate of the weak."\n—Nicol Bolas
trans-unit.target: 「无辜者是否替恶人罪行付出代价？当然要。弱者命本如此。」 ～尼可波拉斯

trans-unit.resname: CMM·168 | Isareth the Awakener | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever Isareth the Awakener attacks, you may pay {X}. When you do, return target creature card with mana value X from your graveyard to the battlefield with a corpse counter on it. If that creature would leave the battlefield, exile it instead of putting it anywhere else.
trans-unit.target: 每当唤尸依萨蕾攻击时，你可以支付{X}。当你如此作时，将目标法术力值为X的生物牌从你坟墓场移回战场，且上面有一个尸体指示物。如果该生物将离开战场，则改为将它放逐，而非置入其他区域。

trans-unit.target: 同族霸权

trans-unit.target: 选择一种生物类别。消灭所有不为该类别的生物。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·169 | Kindred Dominance | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: In the end, the lights fade, the land withers, and only the dead and vile remain.
trans-unit.target: 最终，明光消逝，地貌凋零，唯亡者与恶徒永存。

trans-unit.target: {1}，牺牲另一个生物：令军团先锋勘察。（展示你的牌库顶牌。如果该牌是地，则置于你手上。若否，则在此生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物，然后将所展示的牌放回原位或置入你的坟墓场。）

trans-unit.resname: CMM·170 | Legion Vanguard | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: It takes guts to be a trailblazer.
trans-unit.target: 领路人得有好胆量。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·171 | Lotleth Giant | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I prefer the big and looming to the small and skittering."\n—Cevraya, Golgari shaman
trans-unit.target: 「相比渺小掠行的生物，我更喜欢大到遮天的那种。」 ～葛加理祭师习拉雅

trans-unit.target: 由你操控的其他非人类生物得+1/+1且具有不息异能。（当具不息异能的生物死去时，若其上没有+1/+1指示物，则将它在其拥有者的操控下移回战场，且其上有一个+1/+1指示物。）

trans-unit.target: 挑战大军阀拉妲的人悉数落败，但她会以凯尔顿源火奖励表现最激昂者。此后，他们便为她而燃烧。

trans-unit.target: 「恳请贵舰速离斯鲁巴岛以西水域。此等精致画舫倘若付之一炬，甚为至憾。」 ～亚胥雷准将讯告耶莉兹总帅

trans-unit.resname: CMM·261 | Subira, Tulzidi Caravanner | Card Text: Paragraph 3

trans-unit.resname: CMM·262 | Sulfurous Blast | Card Name

trans-unit.resname: CMM·262 | Sulfurous Blast | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Sulfurous Blast deals 2 damage to each creature and each player. If you cast this spell during your main phase, Sulfurous Blast deals 3 damage to each creature and each player instead.
trans-unit.target: 硫磺冲击波对每个生物和每位牌手各造成2点伤害。如果你是在你的行动阶段施放此咒语，则改为硫磺冲击波对每个生物和每位牌手各造成3点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·262 | Sulfurous Blast | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The Keldons used the toxic vents in the cracked earth to bolster their home's defenses.
trans-unit.target: 凯尔顿人民利用地表喷出毒气的裂口来补强家乡的防御工事。

trans-unit.target: 超载{4}{R}（你可以支付此咒语的超载费用来施放它。若你如此作，则将其叙述中的「目标」更改为「每个」。）

trans-unit.target: 每当你施放仅以晶石磨工查妲为目标的瞬间或法术咒语时，该咒语每能以一个由你操控的其他生物为目标，便将该咒语复制一次。每个复制品都要以这些生物之一为目标，且不能重复选择。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·274 | Azusa, Lost but Seeking | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I do not miss Jukai Forest. It is not my home. My home is Kamigawa, its people my family. Wherever I set my pack and rest my head, I am home."

trans-unit.resname: CMM·289 | Finale of Devastation | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Search your library and/or graveyard for a creature card with mana value X or less and put it onto the battlefield. If you search your library this way, shuffle. If X is 10 or more, creatures you control get +X/+X and gain haste until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 从你牌库和／或你坟墓场中搜寻一张法术力值等于或小于X的生物牌，并将之放进战场。如果你以此法搜寻你的牌库，则洗牌。如果X等于或大于10，则直到回合结束，由你操控的生物得+X/+X且获得敏捷异能。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·289 | Finale of Devastation | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Some spells sing a quiet tune. Others roar.
trans-unit.target: 有些咒语低吟浅唱，有些则放声咆哮。

trans-unit.source: "I stand with every member of my clan, and they stand with me."

trans-unit.source: "I never thought I'd spend my life fighting. I'm a maker, not a destroyer."
trans-unit.target: 「我竟会将生命虚掷于战斗中。我该作的是创造，而不是破坏。」

trans-unit.source: Cascade, cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order. Then do it again.)

trans-unit.resname: CMM·457 | Avacyn, Angel of Hope | Flavor Text

trans-unit.target: 邪魔导师

trans-unit.source: Search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, then shuffle.

trans-unit.resname: CMM·509 | Demonic Tutor | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Beware the generosity of demons.
trans-unit.target: 当恶魔慷慨时，你可要当心。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·510 | Demonlord Belzenlok | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Demonlord Belzenlok
trans-unit.target: 恶魔领主贝赞洛

trans-unit.resname: CMM·510 | Demonlord Belzenlok | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying, trample
trans-unit.target: 飞行，践踏

trans-unit.resname: CMM·510 | Demonlord Belzenlok | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When Demonlord Belzenlok enters the battlefield, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card, then put that card into your hand. If the card's mana value is 4 or greater, repeat this process. Demonlord Belzenlok deals 1 damage to you for each card put into your hand this way.
trans-unit.target: 当恶魔领主贝赞洛进战场时，从你的牌库顶开始放逐牌，直到放逐一张非地牌为止，然后将该牌置于你手上。若该牌的法术力值等于或大于4，则重复此流程。每以此法将一张牌置于你手上，恶魔领主贝赞洛便对你造成1点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·511 | Endrek Sahr, Master Breeder | Card Name

trans-unit.resname: CMM·511 | Endrek Sahr, Master Breeder | Card Text: Paragraph 2

trans-unit.source: Creator of life, bringer of death.

trans-unit.target: {B}，{T}，牺牲另一个生物：派出X个2/2黑色灵俑衍生生物，X为所牺牲生物的力量。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·512 | Ghoulcaller Gisa | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Geralf, must you always whine? I agreed to nothing. I'll raise ghouls anytime I wish."
trans-unit.target: 「基拉夫，你非得喋喋不休吗？我什么都不同意。我要什么时候召唤食尸鬼，就什么时候召唤。」

trans-unit.resname: CMM·513 | Grave Pact | Card Name

trans-unit.resname: CMM·513 | Grave Pact | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Denied the peace of the Blessed Sleep, geists lash out at the living, and the cycle of anger and unrest continues unbroken.
trans-unit.target: 未得受福安眠的不息游魂会向生者发难，这一愤怒无歇的循环正因此永续不断。

trans-unit.target: 伊祖黎的猎捕

trans-unit.resname: CMM·558 | Ezuri's Predation | Card Text
trans-unit.source: For each creature your opponents control, create a 4/4 green Phyrexian Beast creature token. Each of those tokens fights a different one of those creatures.
trans-unit.target: 所有对手每操控一个生物，你便派出一个4/4绿色非瑞人／野兽衍生生物。这些衍生物各与该些生物之一互斗，且不能重复选择。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·558 | Ezuri's Predation | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Slaughter the weak ones. They are unworthy of the gift of *compleation.*"
trans-unit.target: 「杀掉弱者。他们不配完化赋礼。」

trans-unit.source: Finale of Devastation
trans-unit.target: 幻灭终时

trans-unit.resname: CMM·559 | Finale of Devastation | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Search your library and/or graveyard for a creature card with mana value X or less and put it onto the battlefield. If you search your library this way, shuffle. If X is 10 or more, creatures you control get +X/+X and gain haste until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 从你牌库和／或你坟墓场中搜寻一张法术力值等于或小于X的生物牌，并将之放进战场。如果你以此法搜寻你的牌库，则洗牌。如果X等于或大于10，则直到回合结束，由你操控的生物得+X/+X且获得敏捷异能。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·559 | Finale of Devastation | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Some spells sing a quiet tune. Others roar.
trans-unit.target: 有些咒语低吟浅唱，有些则放声咆哮。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·583 | Maelstrom Wanderer | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Cascade, cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order. Then do it again.)
trans-unit.target: 倾曳，倾曳（当你施放此咒语时，从你的牌库顶开始放逐牌，直到放逐一张费用比此咒语低的非地牌为止。你可以施放该牌，且不需支付其法术力费用。将所放逐的牌以随机顺序置于你的牌库底。然后再作一次。）

trans-unit.resname: CMM·584 | Meren of Clan Nel Toth | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Meren of Clan Nel Toth
trans-unit.target: 奈拓族的莫伦

trans-unit.resname: CMM·584 | Meren of Clan Nel Toth | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever another creature you control dies, you get an experience counter.
trans-unit.target: 每当另一个由你操控的生物死去时，你得到一个经验指示物。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·584 | Meren of Clan Nel Toth | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your end step, choose target creature card in your graveyard. If that card's mana value is less than or equal to the number of experience counters you have, return it to the battlefield. Otherwise, put it into your hand.
trans-unit.target: 在你的结束步骤开始时，选择目标在你坟墓场中的生物牌。若该牌的法术力值等于或小于你具有的经验指示物数量，则将它移回战场。若否，则将它置于你手上。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·636 | Bloodchief Ascension | Card Text: Paragraph 2

trans-unit.target: 每当一张牌从任何区域进入对手的坟墓场时，若血侯腾扬上有三个或更多探索指示物，则你可以令该牌手失去2点生命。若你如此作，则你获得2点生命。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·637 | Dread Return | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Dread Return
trans-unit.target: 颤栗再现

trans-unit.resname: CMM·637 | Dread Return | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Flashback— Sacrifice three creatures.
trans-unit.target: 将目标生物牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。 返照～牺牲三个生物。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·637 | Dread Return | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The luckiest acolytes were those who didn't survive long enough to see the archfiend's return.
trans-unit.target: 最幸运的侍僧，是那些未能活到亲眼见证翼邪魔复生者。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·638 | Exsanguinate | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Exsanguinate
trans-unit.target: 放干鲜血

trans-unit.resname: CMM·638 | Exsanguinate | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Each opponent loses X life. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.
trans-unit.target: 每位对手各失去X点生命。你获得若干生命，其数量等同于以此法失去的生命总和。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·638 | Exsanguinate | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "A small sip here and a small sip there, and all of a sudden I need a new dance partner."
trans-unit.target: 「这边亲一下，那边吸一口，转眼便需新人来搭手。」

trans-unit.resname: CMM·639 | Grave Pact | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Grave Pact
trans-unit.target: 墓约

trans-unit.resname: CMM·639 | Grave Pact | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature you control dies, each other player sacrifices a creature.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个由你操控的生物死去时，每位其他牌手各牺牲一个生物。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·639 | Grave Pact | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: As the ritual neared its climax, the exultant cultists waited with bated breath, unaware of the looming consequences of the scroll's translation error.
trans-unit.target: 就在仪式行将到达高潮之际，欢欣教众全都屏气凝神静待结果，全然不知他们就要一起承担卷轴解读出错的苦果。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·640 | Kindred Dominance | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Kindred Dominance
trans-unit.target: 同族霸权

trans-unit.resname: CMM·640 | Kindred Dominance | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Choose a creature type. Destroy all creatures that aren't of the chosen type.
trans-unit.target: 选择一种生物类别。消灭所有不为该类别的生物。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·640 | Kindred Dominance | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Today will end with a feast," gloated the dragon. And what a feast it was.
trans-unit.target: 「看来今天我能饱餐一顿了，」巨龙洋洋得意道。最后也确实成了一顿饱餐。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·641 | Nadier's Nightblade | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Nadier's Nightblade
trans-unit.target: 纳迪尔的夜刃手

trans-unit.resname: CMM·641 | Nadier's Nightblade | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Whenever a token you control leaves the battlefield, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个由你操控的衍生物离开战场时，每位对手各失去1点生命且你获得1点生命。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·641 | Nadier's Nightblade | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Keep looking up and you'll miss what's right in front of your face.
trans-unit.target: 如果你只顾着往头上看，就会错过近在脸前的东西。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·642 | Faithless Looting | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Faithless Looting
trans-unit.target: 丧信掠夺

trans-unit.target: 抓两张牌，然后弃两张牌。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·642 | Faithless Looting | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Flashback {2}{R}

trans-unit.resname: CMM·642 | Faithless Looting | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "If they didn't want me to steal this, they should've used more than seven layers of shatterproof antimagus glass."
trans-unit.target: 「要是他们真的不希望我来偷这东西的话，就不该用只有七层的防爆反魔玻璃来保护它。」

trans-unit.target: 崇轮贤者

trans-unit.resname: CMM·643 | Magus of the Wheel | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Linear time? You may as well believe in triangular gravity!"
trans-unit.target: 「你觉得时间是线性的？那看来你也相信重力场是三角形的！」

trans-unit.resname: CMM·644 | Storm-Kiln Artist | Card Text: Paragraph 2

trans-unit.target: 魔艺～每当你施放或复制瞬间或法术咒语时，派出一个珍宝衍生物。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·644 | Storm-Kiln Artist | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "First you summon the lightning, then you make it dance."

trans-unit.resname: CMM·645 | Treasure Nabber | Card Name

trans-unit.resname: CMM·645 | Treasure Nabber | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Opposable thumbs, opposable toes, prehensile tails, boundary issues . . . no treasure is safe from a goblin."\n—Captain Lannery Storm
trans-unit.target: 「拇指成双，脚趾成对，尾巴灵活，没大没小…什么宝贝都难防鬼怪。」 ～兰娜莉速腾船长

trans-unit.target: 派出X个1/2绿色，具延势异能的蜘蛛衍生生物，X为正向你进行攻击的生物数量。于本回合中，防止非蜘蛛生物将造成之所有战斗伤害。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·647 | Arachnogenesis | Flavor Text

trans-unit.resname: CMM·649 | Kodama's Reach | Flavor Text

trans-unit.target: 「林木所载历史，比任何电脑都要完备。」 ～现世识库佐津树

trans-unit.source: {5}: Shuffle your library, then exile the top card. Until end of turn, you may play that card without paying its mana cost.
